## Green Campus
### Description

The main objective of this project is to support the promotion of sustainable and healthy lifestyles for university campuses and their stakeholders.
By providing awareness, guidance, and support to the young new leaders of sport, we aspire them to be part of the necessary change to promote sustainability and healthy habits.

### content

The online course is targeted at university professors and campus managers, dedicated to raising awareness of the need of these strategies and to provide a basis of knowledge to encourage their implementation in different universities. Comprising six modules covering various related topics in:
Module 1. Introduction to Green Campus
Module 2. Glossary to Green Campus
Module 3. Physical Activity, Sport and Sustainability
Module 4. Sustainability and Innovation
Module 5. Sustainable and effective communication for Green Campus
Module 6. The Green Campus Label
Final Assignment: Build your own Green Campus Good Practice
